thread.title: Best hotel in Paris!
thread.title_full: Best hotel in Paris! - Review of Hotel de JoBo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ifat C
title: Best hotel in Paris!
text:
We loved this place! The unique design, the attention to details was amazing!
The staff is so sweet and helpful. The location is great! We loved the breakfast. The dining room is so lovely and beautiful! We recommend the bar with the cool beers at night!
The whole experience was PERFECT!
Highly recommended!
Room Tip: All the rooms are special and recommended! See more room tips
